It's the way we humans are wired.
It might be a forest of redwood or neon.
It might be an oasis surrounded by sand or sea.
Some of us look for places that inspire us.
Others, for places that empty the mind and help us find that special place within.
There are places that we return to over and over.
And others, we will only ever experience in one special moment.
Whatever you are looking for on this extraordinary planet,...
...Expedia can help you find it and get you home again.
